text: Richard Parker (14 September 1894 – 1 January 1969) was an English professional football centre forward who made over 200 appearances in the Football League. He is best remembered for his three-year spell with Millwall, for whom he scored 62 goals in 88 league matches. == Personal life == Parked attended Tilery School in Stockton-on-Tees.
